page.title: 12A day at school cont.
page.content: We all come in again, If we have finished our first thing, we look on our chart for the second thing, and get on with that. By the time they have finished their second thing, it is Dinnertime. Before we go into dinner the teacher calls out to the oldest boy or girl, 'WASH!'. When they have finished washing, they pass on to the second oldest, and so on. When every-body has washed, we all go into dinner. Before we start. We all say a prayer together. First of all, the waiter gives all the Infants their dinner first, then the table thats first goes up to get their dinner, when they come down the second table goes up, so on. When everyone has finished their dinner the same happened with the pudding. When we have finished our pudding, we all go out to play again.
